sentences.en: At this point, such claims have no bearing on the mortgage or housing crisis; they have bearing only on the holders of these securities themselves.
sentences.cn: 从这一点上来说，这些贷款凭证与抵押贷款或住房危机没有任何关系，他们只与拥有这些证券的持有者有关。

sentences.en: He's having a lot of trouble paying his mortgage every month.
sentences.cn: 他付每月的抵押借款利息有很大的困难.

sentences.en: I actually don't want to be a middle-of-the-road person, married with a mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我其实不想做个平庸之辈，结个婚，背上房贷。

sentences.en: I am a family man with a mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我是个有家室的男人，还有笔按揭款要偿付。

sentences.en: I couldn't sell the London flat, so I let it out to pay the mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我不能把伦敦那套公寓卖掉，所以我把它租出去偿还按揭。

sentences.en: I sometimes find it a strain to be responsible for the mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我有时觉得背负这笔抵押贷款很有压力。

sentences.en: Lower interest rates pleased millions of mortgage payers.
sentences.cn: 利率下调让数百万抵押贷款还款人感到高兴。

sentences.en: Mortgage rates are set to rise again in the spring.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率到春季肯定还要上涨。

sentences.en: She was having trouble meeting her mortgage payments .
sentences.cn: 她还抵押贷款有困难。

sentences.en: Switch to paying your mortgage by direct debit.
sentences.cn: 改成用直接借记方式偿还抵押贷款吧。

sentences.en: The amount required to redeem the mortgage was £358,587.
sentences.cn: 需要偿还的抵押贷款总计358,587英镑。

sentences.en: The bank foreclosed on the mortgage for his previous home.
sentences.cn: 银行取消了他先前住房的抵押赎回权。

sentences.en: The bank refused to accept any mortgage on land.
sentences.cn: 银行拒绝接受任何土地抵押.

sentences.en: The recent rebound in mortgage rates could snuff out the housing recovery.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率最近的回升可能会扼杀房地产的复苏。

sentences.en: Their house was repossessed when they couldn't keep up their mortgage payments.
sentences.cn: 他们无力继续偿还按揭贷款,房子被收了回去.

sentences.en: They were in arrears with their mortgage , so their home was repossessed.
sentences.cn: 他们未按时还按揭贷款, 所以房子被收回了.

sentences.en: They were unable to meet their mortgage repayments.
sentences.cn: 他们不能按时偿还抵押贷款。

sentences.en: They’ve taken out a 30 year mortgage (= they will pay for their house over a period of 30 years ) .
sentences.cn: 他们办理了一笔30年期的抵押贷款。

sentences.en: Thousands of its customers are in arrears with loans and mortgage payments.
sentences.cn: 有数千客户拖欠其贷款和抵押贷款还款。

sentences.en: We decided to use Fred’s redundancy money to pay off the mortgage (= pay back all the money we borrowed for a mortgage ) .
sentences.cn: 我们决定用弗雷德的遣散费来偿清抵押贷款。

sentences.en: We mortgaged our house to start Paul’s business.
sentences.cn: 为了让保罗创业，我们把房子抵押出去了。

sentences.en: Your building society or bank will help arrange a mortgage.
sentences.cn: 你加入的购房互助协会或银行将会给你安排抵押贷款。

words.tran_cn: [会计] 承受抵押人；押入者贷款人
抵押契据,留置权,抵押品

phrases.tran_cn: 反向抵押贷款；反向抵押；反向贷款；倒按揭

trans.tran_cn: 抵押，抵押单据，抵押证明，抵押权，债权
trans.tran_en: a legal arrangement by which you borrow money from a bank or similar organization in order to buy a house, and pay back the money over a period of years
to give a bank, etc. the legal right to own your house, land, etc. if you do not pay the money back that you have borrowed from the bank to buy the house or land

if you mortgage your home, land, or property, you borrow money, usually from a bank, and if you cannot pay back the money within a particular period of time, the bank has the right to sell your property in order to get the money you owe it
